short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seamlessly maintain your own digital library, conveniently save and access your favorite links, all while protecting your privacy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience the ultimate convenience of effortlessly saving and organizing your favorite links with just a single click.

With LinkSaver, you'll enjoy unparalleled control over your digital bookmarks, allowing you to create multiple lists, rename them at will, and easily segregate your links for quick and efficient access.

üëã Say goodbye to accidental deletions!

LinkSaver prioritizes your peace of mind by implementing a thoughtful confirmation system whenever you choose to delete a list. No longer will you have to worry about losing valuable collections of links due to hasty actions. Your organization and hard work are safeguarded every step of the way.

üê£ Embrace the versatility of LinkSaver's intuitive interface.

Two convenient methods await you to effortlessly save your cherished links. Utilize the "Save Current Tab" button to instantly capture the web page you're currently viewing. Alternatively, use the "Add Manually" button to seamlessly save any copied link that catches your attention.

But there's more to LinkSaver than meets the eye.

üìù Recognizing the significance of customization, we empower you to rename link titles, giving them personalized meaning that resonates with your preferences. Experience the joy of curating a collection that reflects your unique interests, passions, and aspirations.

üîè Most importantly, LinkSaver prioritizes your privacy above all else.

This remarkable extension operates completely independent of the internet, meaning no connections to external servers, no cookies, and no cache. Your favorite links remain exclusively in your control, ensuring the utmost confidentiality and data privacy. Enjoy the peace of mind that comes with managing your cherished online resources without compromising your personal information.
